member.name: P:PaunPacker.Plugins.ViewModels.CroppingTrimmerViewModel.AlphaTolerance
member.summary: The Alpha tolerance Pixels with alpha less than or equal to this treshold will be treated as transparent
member.remarks: Alpha tolerance is a number between 0 and 255. Values greater than 255 are treated as 255
